ground_unit.name: Ground Unit
ground_unit.description: Is a unit on the ground (Soldiers, Tanks, etc) Deals 10 damage

navy_unit.name: Navy Unit
navy_unit.description: Is a unit in the ocean (Ships, Submarines, etc) Deals 10 damage

air_unit.name: Air Unit
air_unit.description: Is a unit in the air (Airplanes, Helicopters, etc) Deals 10 damage

robot_dog.name: Robot Dog
robot_dog.description: Robot dogs are mechanical robots that have the anatomical shape of a dog, these are very useful, as they can be strapped up with guns or other weapons. Deals 20 damage

emp_faulty.name: Faulty EMP Driver Blaster
emp_faulty.description: Able to disable/destroy any nearby devices (E.G. Communication lines,war robots,mobile phones etc.) Can take out 20-40% of electrical devices (in your items)

emp_polished.name: Polished EMP Driver Blaster
emp_polished.description: Able to disable/destroy any nearby devices (E.G. Communication lines,war robots,mobile phones etc.) Can take out 50-70% of electrical devices (in your items) and might stop a nuke (IHQ 2.2 only) (Except DextraNuke)

emp_superior.name: Superior EMP Driver Blaster
emp_superior.description: Able to disable/destroy any nearby devices (E.G. Communication lines,war robots,mobile phones etc.) Can take out 80-100% of electrical devices (in your items) and might stop a nuke (IHQ 2.2 only) (Except DextraNuke)

nuke.name: Nuke
nuke.description: Nuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire city. It is a very powerful weapon, but it is quite dangerous. Deals 100 damage

hypernuke.name: HyperNuke
hypernuke.description: Hypernuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire state/province. It is a very powerful weapon, but it is also very dangerous. It is not recommended to use for testing on country/land that is not completely empty. Deals 200 damage

dextranuke.name: DextraNuke
dextranuke.description: DextraNuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire country. Highly dangerous, do not even buy, or use, unless you are insane. Deals 500 damage

medical_aid.name: Medical Aid
medical_aid.description: Cures 60 HP, has a max use of 5, being able to heal 300 HP at a time

lightning_sandwich.name: Lightning Sandwich Packet
lightning_sandwich.description: Cures 40 HP, has a max use of 5, being able to heal 200 HP at a time
